name: No Deal or No Deal: A Brexit Game
name_original: No Deal or No Deal: A Brexit Game
description:
Reckon Bojo's bodged it? Think you could do a better job? Take the reigns of the Brexit campaign, in this side-scrolling classic and show Boris how it's done. Jump to dodge political scandal!

Developers: Morgan Jones and Rowan Rumble; Art and Graphics: Liam Prothero; Sound: https://www.zapsplat.com

Privacy Policy: https://no-deal-or-no-deal.flycricket.io/privacy.html
